# GRAMS MERN Stack Project - Setup Instructions

This is a complete MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack project for the GRAMS governance portal.

## Project Structure
- **client/**: React frontend application
- **server/**: Node.js + Express backend
- Uses monorepo approach with root package.json

## Key Technologies
- Frontend: React 18, Vite, TailwindCSS, Axios
- Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT
- Database: MongoDB

## Setup Checklist
- [ ] Create client (React) application
- [ ] Create server (Express) application
- [ ] Configure environment variables
- [ ] Set up database models
- [ ] Create API routes
- [ ] Set up authentication
- [ ] Build responsive UI components
- [ ] Test all endpoints
- [ ] Deploy ready

## Getting Started
1. Install dependencies: `npm run install-all`
2. Set up .env files for both client and server
3. Run development server: `npm run dev`
4. Access application at http://localhost:5173
